1264190.name: YoloMic
1264190.description:
Use YoloMic to be visually alerted of external sounds such as door knocks. Never miss another pizza delivery while blasting your headphones again!

Ideal for headphone users. Requires a microphone.

Features

  • Audio triggered visual alerts
  • Alerts shown as audio frequency spectrum to help identify sound
  • Noise isolation to reduce background noise
  • Multiple alert positions
  • Themeable and resizable alerts
  • Adjustable audio sensitivity
  • Audio source selection
  • Alert toggle and other hotkeys
  • Near zero impact on performance
